featured.text: For example, Superman always arrives in the nick of time to prevent a disaster from happening, Peter Pan can fly at will to tease the bad guy Captain Hook, and Harry Potter has his magic power to take revenge on his uncle, aunt and cousin, who always ill-treat him. 44.

definition.en_def: To make fun of or attempt to provoke in a playful or mocking way.
definition.example: She likes to tease her little brother by hiding his toys.
